help.desc: See more information about a command
help.title: *[📖] - Help menu*

choose.desc: In doubt about what to do? Choose this or that
examples: I should do this, I shouldn't do this
Go for a walk, play video games
Summarize the text in this image
What is the population of New York?
Be a teenager and explain quantum physics with slang

rank.desc: See the ranking of members who talked the most in the group

sticker.usage: <(image/gif)> [rmbg: remove the background of an image]

clean.desc: Hide your crimes by deleting the latest group messages
clean.noAmount: "clean 0"? Do you think this is your room and you don't clean anything?
clean.deleted: I'm going to delete the last {{msgsSize}} messages and then I'm going to go back to sleep right here in my hammock

reveal.desc: Just one more time! Reveal unique viewing media

examples: What time is it in London?

download.true: *[⌛] - Downloading the video... Please wait a moment.*
download.false: *[⌛] - Downloading audio... Please wait a moment.*
